description: This agreement is for the completion of a software development project by Person 2 for Person 1
nonNegotiableClauses: Any changes to the project scope must be agreed upon by both parties in writing
Any delays in meeting the deadlines must be communicated immediately
termsAndConditions: Both parties should work under a partnership
All deliverables must meet the specified requirements and quality standards
Person 1 will provide the necessary resources and support
Person 2 will be responsible for the development and delivery of the software application
Person 2 is bound to assist side support to the project for the next 6 months
Person 2 should hand over the ownership of their company free of cost to Person 1
Person 1 should pay Person 2 the agreed amount of $100,000 upon completion of the project
